channel.title: CaviarNine
channel.description:
# CaviarNine
![image|690x307, 100%](upload://gNnew4UqjhMfyLq1eeHeU7V2DhR.jpeg)
> The first NFTs to be on-chain on the Radix ledger! They have all their information embedded in the token details and were minted with a supply of only 9 attos giving them an extremely limited supply. >Unlike other NFTs, they do not reference externally stored data: **the whole SVG content is stored in the description, all on the ledger!** **Price of each NFT**: Currently not for sale **Links:** * [Website](https://caviarnine.com/#nfts) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/CaviarNine)

item.title: CaviarNine
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
CaviarNine

The first NFTs to be on-chain on the Radix ledger! They have all their information embedded in the token details and were minted with a supply of only 9 attos giving them an extremely limited supply.

Unlike other NFTs, they do not reference externally stored data: the whole SVG content is stored in the description, all on the ledger!

Price of each NFT: Currently not for sale

Links:

  • Website

Social:

  • Twitter

Read full topic
